column4: Monsanto sees US 2013 corn acres steady at 96 mln acres
column5: By Carey Gillam     Oct 3 Monsanto Co.  the world's largest seed company  said Wednesday that U.S. corn and soybean plantings in 2013 are likely to be similar to what was seen this year  though soybean acres may climb.     As the company starts selling its seed products for the spring planting season  Monsanto President Brett Begemann said the company was planning for about 96 million acres of corn planted in the United States in 2013  and 76 million or more in soybean acres.
